text: Jean-Claude Servan-Schreiber (11 April 1918 â€“ 11 April 2018) was a French politician and journalist. He served as a member of the National Assembly from 1965 to 1967, representing Seine. He was a member of the Union for the New Republic, a center-right political party. He was born in Paris, France. Schreiber died on April 11, 2018 in Paris on his 100th birthday. == References == Category:1918 births Category:2018 deaths Category:French centenarians Category:French journalists Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Writers from Paris
title: Jean-Claude Servan-Schreiber
